    boolean isValid​(TypeEnvironment e)
    Gets whether a treeType is valid under a certain treeType environment A treeType is valid if it's a correctly formed Primitive, a typedef/alias of a valid treeType or if the treeType is a compound treeType, all of it's members are valid
